product_name: The North Face Big Shot II Daypack
long_description: If you're searching for a daypack to haul your gear while you're traveling to work or class, check out the Big Shot II pack from The North Face. It contains ample pockets for storage and is equipped with resilient daisy chains on the front pocket to thread additional gear on. Large main compartment features an internal sleeve that fits most 15 in. laptops; sleeve has organizational pockets and a hydration clip and port to add your own reservoir. Front vertical stash pockets have water-resistant zippers. Side mesh pockets hold your water bottle or compact umbrella. Side compression straps compress load for easier carrying. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps and padded back panel offer load-carrying comfort; polyethylene sheet along back adds structure and support. Padded winged webbing hipbelt enhances carrying support and stability, and stows cleanly away when you don't need it; sternum strap further stabilizes the pack. Reinforced bottom panel provides long-lasting durability. The North Face Big Shot II daypack is endorsed by the American Chiropractic Association (ACA).
short_description: If you're searching for a daypack to haul your gear while you're traveling to work or class, check out the Big Shot II pack from The North Face.
